item.title: Error need help
item.dc:creator: @nejat nejat
item.description:
@nejat wrote:

tnx man nice script junior, BUT, ofcourse there is a but that “BUT” is that it moves toooooo slow, so dont care about the mouse smooth movement and stuff, cuz this game does have people watching if ya cheat, nahmean so i tried to change the wait things but didnt help much so could u make the script move like in a millisec and click much faster, like make it click all the time and dont make the “mouse” move like a real person moving it, just make it be on the color all the time tnx man

item.title: Error need help
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

[scar]program ballclicker;
{.include Osi.txt}
{.include par.txt}

const
ballspot=0;
ballcolor=16777215;

procedure clickball;
var
x2,y2: integer;
begin
WAIT(35+RANDOM(29))
if(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballspot,1,1,511,413))or
(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballcolor,1,1,511,413))then
mouse(x2,y2,3,3, true);
end;

//you were trying to use the main loop as a procedure.

begin
activateClient;
wait(2000)
repeat
clickball; // the procedure want to repeat HAS to be inbetween
// ‘repeat until’ statements
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Here, I typed what you did wrong in the script.

item.title: Error need help
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

Well i was making this script for a game that a guy requested were you have to click a soccer ball like on neopets the zurroball

I have a few errors that need fixing plz help

[scar]program ballclicker;
{.include Osi.txt}
{.include par.txt}
const

ballspot=0;
ballcolor=16777215;
procedure clickball;
var
x2,y2: integer;
begin
WAIT(35+RANDOM(29))
if(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballspot,1,1,511,413))or
(findcolorspiral2(x2,y2,ballcolor,1,1,511,413))then
mouse(x2,y2,3,3, true);
repeat
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
